questions.text: What symbol represents good luck in Vietnam?
Which Greek creature had a series of concentric rings on his forehead?
What does the word Ouroboros mean in Greek?
questions.explanation:
tail-devourer.

	The Ouroboros symbol represents a serpent with its tail in its mouth. It signifies such concepts as cyclicality and renewal - the "infinite circle".

questions.text: The dyadic symbol of the Mandorla is from which culture?
questions.explanation:
India.

	Also called vesica piscis in the Western culture and signifies Age of Pisces.

questions.text: What is the collective name of the 9 Egyptian gods that rule the World?
